item.title: Contour Example 6: Adding Labels to Contours
item.description: Contour Example 6: Adding Labels to Contours Introduction In this example, we like to add a label to a contour. The label provides information about measurements and about the contour itself. The label remains connected to the contour and can be moved via mouse interactions. Steps to do Develop your network Add the following modules to your workspace and connect them as shown. Load the example DICOM image ProbandT1.dcm. Data Objects Contours Example 6 The SoView2DCSOExtensibleEditor manages attached CSO editors and renderers and offers an optional default renderer for all types of CSOs.
